org.cpsolver.ifs.criteria

Interface Criterion<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    V - Variable
    T - Value
    All Superinterfaces:
    ExtendedInfoProvider<V,T>, InfoProvider<V,T>, ModelListener<V,T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCriterion, AssignedValue, AssignmentCount, AttributePreferences, BackToBack, BackToBackInstructorPreferences, BrokenTimePatterns, CoursePreferences, DeltaTimePreference, DepartmentBalancingPenalty, DifferentLecture, DistanceToStronglyPreferredRoom, DistributionPenalty, DistributionPreferences, Distributions, DistributionViolation, ExamCriterion, ExamRotationPenalty, ExamSplitter, FlexibleConstraintCriterion, HardConflicts, IgnoredCommittedStudentConflict, IgnoredStudentConflict, ImportantStudentConflict, ImportantStudentHardConflict, InstructorBackToBackConflicts, InstructorConflict, InstructorDirectConflicts, InstructorDistanceBackToBackConflicts, InstructorFairness, InstructorLunchBreak, InstructorMoreThan2ADayConflicts, InstructorNotAvailableConflicts, InstructorPreferences, InstructorSchedulingCriterion, InstructorStudentConflict, InstructorStudentHardConflict, LargeExamsPenalty, OriginalInstructor, PeriodIndexPenalty, PeriodPenalty, PeriodSizePenalty, PeriodViolation, PerturbationPenalty, Perturbations, PlacementSelectionCriterion, PotentialHardConflicts, QuadraticStudentConflict, QuadraticStudentHardConflict, RoomPenalty, RoomPerturbationPenalty, RoomPreferences, RoomSizePenalty, RoomSizePenalty, RoomSplitDistancePenalty, RoomSplitPenalty, RoomViolation, RoomViolations, SameCommon, SameCourse, SameDays, SameInstructor, SameLink, SameRoom, SameSubpartBalancingPenalty, StudentBackToBackConflicts, StudentCommittedConflict, StudentConflict, StudentDirectConflicts, StudentDistanceBackToBackConflicts, StudentDistanceConflict, StudentHardConflict, StudentLuchBreak, StudentMinimizeDaysOfWeek, StudentMinimizeScheduleHoles, StudentMoreThan1ADayConflicts, StudentMoreThan2ADayConflicts, StudentNotAvailableConflicts, StudentOnlineConflict, StudentOverlapConflict, StudentOverLunchConflict, StudentWorkdayConflict, TeachingPreferences, TimeOverlaps, TimePreferences, TimePreferences, TimetablingCriterion, TimeViolations, TooBigRooms, UnusedInstructorLoad, UselessHalfHours, WeightedHardConflicts

    public interface Criterion<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>>
extends ModelListener<V,T>, ExtendedInfoProvider<V,T>
    Criterion.

    An optimization objective can be split into several (optimization) criteria and modeled as a weighted sum of these. This makes the implementation of a particular problem more versatile as it allows for an easier modification of the optimization objective.
    Version:
    IFS 1.3 (Iterative Forward Search)
    Copyright (C) 2006 - 2014 Tomáš Müller
    muller@unitime.org
    http://muller.unitime.org

    Author:
    Tomáš Müller

      • toString

        String toString(Assignment<V,T> assignment)
        Simple text representation of the criterion and its value. E.g., X:x where X is the AbstractCriterion.getAbbreviation() and x is the current value AbstractCriterion.getValue(Assignment).
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        Returns:
        short string representation (e.g., PP:95% for period preference)
